desc: Hitchhiker Toys specializes in toys, collectibles, horror, & much more. The store is located in White House, TN-outside of Nashville. Perfect for collectors, gifts, birthdays, Christmas, or anytime! Our inventory is ever changing- We Buy, Sell, & Trade- no collections too big or small. Walk down memory lane with us!
